WorkItem.Description:
I'm moving from windows to Linux. On linux Typescript gives me errors on the export = statement.

Using: typescript@1.0.1  node@v0.10.29

tsc --sourcemap --module AMD Controller.ts

Gives error:
Controller.ts (12,9): modifiers can not appear before an expression statement or label

Code is:
```
class Controller {



}


export = Controller;

```

Comments.Message:
I thought fixing it myself,, build the git respository. 

but it is already fixed in release 1.0.3.0.
